aertb.core.loaders
==========================

Suggested use is:

.. code-block:: python

   from aertb.core.loaders import PolarityEventFile
   file = PolarityEventFile('../myFile.myext') 
   # handle every supported file extension
   # then file.header, file.get_events() ...

.. automodule:: aertb.core.loaders
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
